survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from gym members regarding their overall experience, satisfaction with facilities, and suggestions for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness and maintenance of the gym facilities?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for ease of analysis. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness and maintenance of the gym facilities?

questions.question_text: How often do you visit the gym per week?
questions.client_notes: Ensure answer options cover all possible frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you visit the gym per week?

questions.question_text: Which of the following gym amenities do you use regularly? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multiple-choice question to identify popular amenities.

script.question_text: Which of the following gym amenities do you use regularly? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety and quality of group fitness classes offered?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Group fitness classes' in Q3
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Ensure question only appears to relevant respondents.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (single-choice). Conditional display based on Q3 selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety and quality of group fitness classes offered?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Group fitness classes' in Q3

questions.question_text: How would you rate the availability of gym equipment during peak hours?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to capture nuanced feedback.

script.question_text: How would you rate the availability of gym equipment during peak hours?

questions.question_text: Have you interacted with the gym staff or personal trainers?
questions.client_notes: Binary question to filter respondents for follow-up questions.

script.question_text: Have you interacted with the gym staff or personal trainers?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the professionalism and helpfulness of the gym staff?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Conditional question.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (single-choice). Display if Q6 = 'Yes'.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the professionalism and helpfulness of the gym staff?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the gym?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the gym?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this gym to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: Net Promoter Score (NPS) question variant. Use a 5-point scale.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this gym to a friend or colleague?

questions.question_text: What is your primary reason for joining this gym?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture unlisted reasons.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (single-choice) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is your primary reason for joining this gym?
